entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
